summary.span: 表示 控件中的一个项。

span.span: Represents an item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示控件中的项 ，如标题节、页脚部分或数据项。A object represents an item in a control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data item. 控件中的数据项 存储在中 ，可以使用控件的属性进行访问 。The data items in the control are stored in a that can be accessed by using the property of the control. 可以使用 以编程方式访问控件中的项的属性 。You can use a to programmatically access the properties of an item in a control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 来显示控件中每个数据项的内容 。The following example demonstrates how to use a to display the contents of each data item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取或设置与 控件中 对象关联的数据项。

span.span: Gets or sets a data item associated with the object in the control.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示 控件中的一个数据项。

span.span: An that represents a data item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定与控件中的对象关联的数据项的属性 。Use the property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the object in the control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于控件中的数据项 。This property only applies to data items in the control. 对象的属性 必须设置为 枚举值之一。The property of the object must be set to one of the enumeration values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来显示控件中数据项的内容 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the contents of the data items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取控件的 集合中的 对象的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the object from the collection of the control.

value.span: 集合中的 对象的索引。

span.span: The index of the object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定 集合中对象的索引号 。Use the property to determine the index number of the object from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于控件中的数据项 。This property only applies to data items in the control. 对象的属性 必须设置为 `ListItemType.Item` 、 `ListItemType.AlternatingItem` 、 `ListItemType.SelectedItem` 或 `ListItemType.EditItem` 。The property of the object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来显示控件的集合中的对象的索引号 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the index number of the object from the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataListItem.ItemIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataListItem.ItemIndex Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataListItem.ItemIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataListItem.ItemIndex Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取由 控件中 对象表示的项的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the item represented by the object in the control.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定由对象表示的项的类型 。Use the property to determine the type of the item represented by the object. 下表列出了各种项类型。The following table lists the various item types. |项类型Item Type|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|控件的标题部分 。The heading section of the control.| |`Footer`|控件的页脚部分 。The footer section of the control.| |`Item`|控件中的项 。An item in the control.| |`AlternatingItem`|控件中的交替项 。An alternating item in the control.| |`SelectedItem`|控件中的选定项 。The selected item in the control.| |`EditItem`|在控件中选择进行编辑的项 。The item selected for editing in the control.| |`Separator`|控件项之间的分隔符 。A separator between the items of the control.| |`Pager`|控件的页选择部分 。The page selection section of the control.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定由对象表示的项的项类型 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the item type of the item represented by the object. 项在控件中的创建顺序 随项类型一起显示。The order that items are created in the control is displayed along with the item type. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListItemCreated#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemCreated/CS/datalistitemcreatedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListItemCreated#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemCreated/VB/datalistitemcreatedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于 4.0，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .
